name: VRC Formula Alpha 2024
description:
Formula Alpha 2024:

VRC proudly presents the Formula Alpha 2024, an evolution of our acclaimed FA 2023 project: With around 1000hp, including 160hp from a refined electric powertrain, and a car weight of 722kg, this machine dominates the track with superior downforce and handling. The Formula Alpha 2024 features an advanced ERS mapper, enhanced setup options, multiple steering wheel configurations, and a highly optimized performance model, pushing the boundaries of realism and immersion.

*Please note that while this version of the mod maintains full compatibility with "vanilla Assetto Corsa", it does not include certain features exclusively available with Custom Shaders Patch (CSP) and LUA scripting. These features encompass visually simulated tire scuffing, precise steering wheel displays, advanced MGU-K profiles, enhanced pedal and torque mappings, as well as anti-stall and brake magic brake bias functionalities.
author: VRC Modding Team
